trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ContextCreating" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs> object has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs.Context%2A> property that can be assigned to a long-running <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> in the handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.ContextCreating> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs> objeto tem um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs.Context%2A> propriedade que pode ser atribuída a uma execução longa <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> no manipulador para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.ContextCreating> evento.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Object Context Life-Cycle Management (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [o gerenciamento de ciclo de vida de contexto de objeto (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the creation of an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> variable of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object and its assignment to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs.Context%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra a criação de um <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> variável do <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> objeto e sua atribuição para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs.Context%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" /> that is used by the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" /> que é usado pela fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The object context that is used by the data source.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de objeto que é usado pela fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs.Context%2A> property can be assigned to a long-running <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> in the handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.ContextCreating> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs.Context%2A> propriedade pode ser atribuída a uma execução longa <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> no manipulador para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView.ContextCreating> evento.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Object Context Life-Cycle Management (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [o gerenciamento de ciclo de vida de contexto de objeto (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the creation of an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> variable of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object and its assignment to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs.Context%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra a criação de um <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> variável do <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> objeto e sua atribuição para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs.Context%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextCreatingEventArgs> objeto.
